title: Kat is so damn boring to play against.
body:
I don't like Riven, but playing against her can be intense and fun.
I Hate hate hate Zed, but getting away from his ult and barely living can be exhilarating.
I Dislike playing against Yasuo because of his windwall, but outplaying one can feel like you accomplished something.

Going into solo que and playing against a Katarina, beating her, having her go bot and pick up a double and then knowing the shit storm coming....Is just boring as hell. 

I'm not saying she's op or she needs a nerf, but god damn she's so binary it's disgusting. I'll admit that her early game damage is so lackluster it's pathetic, but she snowballs so ridiculously hard it's almost aneurysm inducing. If she was gated by cooldowns I would be okay with her but she's not. She's not as forgiving as Zed but she's much more frustrating to deal with. IMO her damage reduction needs to go, if it's going to stay that way other assassins like Talon and Diana should get something similar, because as it stands you can't win a trade with her if she's even a hair ahead of you. Plus she's all point and click and as I recall people were bashing Veigar because he's point and click, so it's a double standard in it's own way.
